dict.acceptation: 点头；打瞌睡；上下摆动；变得粗心大意；
点头示意；使弯曲，使屈服；点头答应；
点头；点头同意；打瞌睡，打盹；粗心大意；

sent.orig: Methods: Twenty NOD mice were into diabetic group (experimental group) and nondiabetic group (control group).
sent.trans: 方法建立糖尿病NOD小鼠模型作为实验组，选用同龄NOD小鼠作为对照。

sent.orig: As a NOD commander you need to on the offensive.
sent.trans: 作为Nod的指挥官，你需要坚持主动出击。

sent.orig: Bs a NOD commander you need to go on the offensive.
sent.trans: 作为Nod的指挥官，你需要对峙主动出击。

sent.orig: The Temple of Nod and other ways to stop Shockwave Artillery.
sent.trans: Nod神殿以及其他阻止冲击波炮击的方法。

sent.orig: NOD is not the army that should wait for tech up andaround waiting be attacked.
sent.trans: Nod不应该是那种坐等科学技术守株待兔类型的军队。
